item.description:
This special event will merge the healing energies of Qi Gong, Gongs, Singing bowls, and Aromatherapy. Your journey will begin with simple Qi Gong exercises, allowing for movement of energy through the body while the Conduit are creating a sound bath with Gongs that send vibrations through your body. The sound of the gong itself can create the possibilities for deep automatic meditation and relaxation. Singing gongs in this respect becomes very therapeutic, providing an environment for self-healing. Several essences will then be applied followed by a guided meditation accompanied by Singing bowls. This beautiful journey will help you access profound inner wisdom and integrate that knowledge to become more empowered and fulfilled in your life.

The Conduit Center, 1227 Burnside Ave. #1, East Hartford, CT
The event will be from 4-5:30 pm
$20 per person.

www.gongtheplanet.com
Erik Harris www.chiforhealing.com

Â
item.name: Qi Gong Essence Meditation with Sound Healing
